sandstorms bury the horizon

heading: **Detailed 2:**

Temperatures plummet after dusk, toxic winds carry irradiated

heading: **Detailed 3:**
description:

metal—seek cover

heading: **Detailed 4:**

Winds intensify, hurling jagged debris from the ruins of the
old world

heading: **Detailed 5:**
description:
Heatwave persists into tomorrow, with sporadic lightning
igniting the dry wastes
